attributes.action: sack Mrs Shoesmith for her failings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Heads must role and no more than at the top-end.
Mrs Shoesmith must be dismissed from her post, with no Golden handshake, with immediate effect.
Her arrogant refusal to publicly apologise for her department failing to save the life of an innocent child, Baby P, is testament to the unsuitability of her continuing in the role.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
